venue.name: Center of Arts at the Armory

item.description:
Somerville Local First 's fourth annual Festival & Fundraiser – Harvest Fest 2012 is coming up on Saturday, October 27th, 2012 at Arts @ The Armory! Bringing together some of the best in local restaurants, breweries and entertainment, while raising much needed capital for SLF, Harvest Fest is an event not to be missed.

 

 

 

 

 

If you haven’t already, get your tickets now because they are going fast! The festivities are broken down into two sessions, Session 1 from 1-5 pm and Session 2 from 6-10 pm. Don’t miss out on all that Harvest Fest has to offer, get your tickets now and see for yourself why it is becoming one of the most anticipated events in Greater Boston.
item.name: Harvest Fest 2012 @ the Armory in Somerville (ticketed event)
